name: AVVideoCompositionCoreAnimationTool
desc: An object used to incorporate Core Animation into a video composition.

items.name: init(additionalLayer: CALayer, asTrackID: CMPersistentTrackID)
items.desc: Adds a Core Animation layer to the video composition.

items.name: init(postProcessingAsVideoLayer: CALayer, in: CALayer)
items.desc: Composes the composited video frame with a Core Animation layer.

items.name: init(postProcessingAsVideoLayers: [CALayer], in: CALayer)
items.desc: Composes the composited video frames with the Core Animation layer.
